content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.usb_apps_device_vendor_sam_d21_xpro
content.displayName: Vendor Example (vendor) Example for SAM D21/DA1 Family
content.shortDescription: This application creates a USB CDC Device that enumerates as a custom vendor USB device on the USB host PC. The device uses USB Device Layer Endpoint functions and demonstrates the PC host's ability to control the LEDs on the board and query the status of a switch through PC utility.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: SAM D21 Xplained Pro Evaluation Kit
